original: 15.30. Lokiyaduka, Kusalattika🔽Lokiyaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: lokiya duka kusalattika  lokiyam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
translated: The Chapter on the Triad of the Direction Opposite to that of Conformity with the Faculties, the Chapter on the Triad of the Direction Opposite to that of Conformity with the Faculties, the Text on the Triad of the Direction Opposite to that of Conformity with the Faculties🔽… a mundane profitable idea … a mundane unprofitable idea … a mundane indeterminate idea …🔽… a supramundane unprofitable idea … a supramundane indeterminate idea …

original: Lokiyaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nalokuttaro naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.🔽Lokiyaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nalokiyo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
analyzed: lokiyam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na lokuttaraḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka 🔽lokiyam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na lokiyaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā dve pe avigate dve
